Khonkolor::

"Cya Halucigen" screamed Khonkolor "If you like join us just come 
back and I'll invite you a glass of energon"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., gunthers8@n... wrote:
> ::Halucigen::
> Halucigen made a circle in the air to talk to this...Khonkolor. 
> "My anme is Halucigen and i am going to find my place in this 
world. 
> Goodbye and work on you aim."
> 
> 'Hmm Decepticon....they were more my style....but still not 
> right....i must find some like them' he thought to himself and flew 
> off into the distance.
> 
>

> > Khonkolor
> > 
> > "HEY BUDDY" Said Khonkolor to Halucigen "Give five, PAL... We 
have

> who're

> >

battle 
> > and 
> > > the seemingly one enemy bot still fighting....but who was the 
> enemy 
> > > to him.  He had only fought with the Maximal's to save his own

> nasty.

were
